data.text:
Adult Aerospace Academy

Join us for an author talk with Mark Musick on his book Boxes: The Secret Life of Howard Hughes. Learn about the details of how Howard Hughes pulled the wool over the eyes of the public and lived his last 25 years with the woman he loved, finally dying in Nov. 2001.

Mark Musick retired from the military in 2008 at the rank of Major General. In 2002 Mark met Eva McLelland who told him a secret which she had not divulged to anyone. Her story consisted of the ingredients of fabulous wealth, a reclusive man unable to escape his famous life, assistance from the CIA providing an alternate identity, and a loving wife who knew how to keep a secret.

Program includes free admission to the museum.

Members, please enter the code you received via email for 50% off your ticket. If you did not receive your code, please email tdarling@neam.org or call 860-623-3305 x314.
